name: In The Cave (Pug_Dev)
description:
In the cave:

In the cave it's a game I made for the "Mini Jem 99: Birds"

my Background:

this is the first game jam that I really make a game for :)

NOTE:

the game is very very short I'm sorry about it and hope you enjoy :)

Controls:

Arrow keys to change Directions,

Space key to boosting the Bird speed.

 Credits:

The game idea, Code and Art and Music by Guy Hanan

Engine: Godot engine
